name: Secured Armor
text: You are adept at using your armor to cover your most vulnerable areas.
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +11 or fighter level 8th, armor training class feature, proficiency with medium or heavy armor.
benefit: When you are hit by a confirmed critical hit or a sneak attack, there is a 25% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
special: This chance stacks with the light fortification and moderate fortification armor special abilities.
staminaText: If you fail to negate a critical hit against you, you can spend 5 stamina points to cause the attack to deal half damage. (See page 17.)
text_zh: 你学会了该如何使用盔甲来保护你的要害。
prerequisites_zh: BAB+11或者战士8级，盔甲训练职业特性，擅长中甲或者重甲。
benefit_zh: 当你被一次已经确认的重击或者偷袭击中时，你有25%的几率无视掉它们，让它们造成普通的攻击。
special_zh: 这个概率和次等护命和中等护命盔甲特殊能力叠加。
staminaText_zh: 如果你未能成功让对你的重击无效，你可以消耗5点耐力来让这次攻击造成一半的伤害。
